name: Grapple Robber
description:
It doesn't matter if everyone thinks you are evil, it doesn't matter that everything along the way is dangerous, you need to steal that data!

Break in all alone using your grapple gun, defeat guards, and steal the data that will decide the fate of the world!

Made for Newbies Game Jam (2022-1)

Theme is Minimalism

Minimalism is achieved through minimalistic mechanics, focusing on the grapple gun.

Credits

Programming by Iliya Galich

RevanousHydra - itch.io
